services.name: AI API
services.description: Unified AI provider — Claude, Ollama, Mistral. Chat completions, embeddings, OCR, summarization, topic extraction.

services.name: Intelligence API
services.description: Web crawling, screenshot capture, transcript generation, and intelligence gathering with vector search.

services.name: Agent Memory
services.description: Hierarchical memory for AI agents. Three layers: Resources (raw) → Items (facts) → Categories (summaries). Temporal awareness with decay.

services.name: Document Index
services.description: Vectorless RAG document indexing using PageIndex. PDF/markdown indexing, YouTube transcripts, LLM-powered document chat.

services.name: Document Partitioning
services.description: Document parsing and element extraction via Unstructured library. PDF, DOCX, images, email, markdown.

services.name: Congressional Districts
services.description: 119th Congress, 441 districts. Demographics, GeoJSON boundaries, radio coverage, state data.

services.name: Voter Analysis
services.description: AI-powered voter segment analysis. Demographics vs baseline, behavioral enrichment, affinity scoring, donor propensity.

services.name: Survey Platform (YASP)
services.description: Create surveys, manage questions, collect and analyze responses.

services.name: File Storage & CDN
services.description: S3-compatible object storage via MinIO. Buckets, upload/download, presigned URLs, public CDN.

services.name: SMS/MMS Gateway
services.description: Unified SMS/MMS gateway for Ejoin devices. Single send, bulk send, device management.

services.name: WhatsApp Ingestion
services.description: WhatsApp message ingestion via Node.js relay. Message processing pipeline, AI gist generation.

services.name: Webhook Router
services.description: Centralized webhook ingestion (Typeform, GitHub, Stripe). HMAC verification, async persistence, consumer-scoped access.

services.name: URL Shortener
services.description: Short links with privacy-preserving click analytics. Custom/auto slugs, expiry, enable/disable.

services.name: VPN Cluster
services.description: Distributed VPN cluster with OpenWRT workers and WireGuard tunnels. Geographic routing for intelligence.

services.name: TOR Cluster
services.description: Anonymous web fetching through Tor worker pool. Load balancing: round_robin, sticky, random, least_connections.

services.name: PIN Gate Authentication
services.description: Domain-wide PIN authentication gateway for nominate.ai subdomains. HMAC-SHA256, 7-day sessions.

services.name: System Monitor
services.description: Central monitoring, 8 agents, incident management, SMS alerts, AI diagnosis, self-healing.

services.name: MCP Service Catalog
services.description: MCP server exposing the CB service catalog to LLM agents. SSE transport for remote clients, Inspector UI for humans.

services.name: Workflow Engine
services.description: Lightweight JSON-backed CRM workflow automation. Contacts, templates, instances, multi-tenant, SMS/email routing.

services.name: Donation Processing
services.description: Campaign donation processing (Transaxt migration). Authorize.Net CIM, 4 portals, 595K donations.

services.name: Hospitality BI (VIP)
services.description: Virgin Islands Pulse — hospitality portfolio BI. Clover POS, Homebase, Cloudbeds, WebRezPro integration.

services.name: Issue Tracking
services.description: Unified GitHub issue management across CB repositories. Full CRUD, comments, project boards.
